Occupation History:
Sofia Eva Bjerregaard is a 27 year old Research Scientist from Italy.
Sofia Eva Bjerregaard's first role was as a Research Scientist at Menarini Industrie Farmaceutiche Riunite S.r.l., where she worked diligently from 2022 till now to establish a strong reputation.
